name: Look Past
description:
Look Past is a game created in game jam.

The sphere allows you to see into the future to understand the objective of the puzzle

Team : 

Killian  DS / Marine GN / Evan F / Louis-Noel H / Sacha L / Gabin G / Lisa M / Louka C

Control :

Space for Start Game in Menu

ZQSD - movement

Right click - pick object

Left click - throw object
